attributes.action: Change New Years Day to a nicer day in Spring.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New Years Day is such a dreary dissapointing affair. Grey and wet it fails to inspire and should be changed to a day latter in the calander.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
